featuresSection.heading: Explore Diverse Residential Options When You Rent House in Sector 48 Gurgaon
description: Sector 48 boasts a versatile real estate landscape, catering to everyone from single professionals to large families. Whether your requirement is a compact, easy-to-manage studio apartment or a spacious independent house, this locality offers exceptional choices that meet diverse budget and lifestyle needs. We categorize the best rental opportunities to help you swiftly locate properties that align with your specific demands.

Each property type offers unique benefits related to privacy, amenities, and community atmosphere. Our detailed descriptions ensure you have all the necessary information about floor plans, security arrangements, and proximity to essential services before you schedule a viewing. Discover the ideal rental space waiting for you in Sector 48 Gurgaon.

features.title: Luxury Serviced Apartments
features.description: Ideal for corporate executives and expats seeking hassle-free living. These rentals provide fully furnished units with all utilities included, often featuring housekeeping, high-speed internet, and access to premium clubhouse facilities. Enjoy superior security and maintenance support without the long-term commitment of traditional leases in Sector 48.

features.title: Studio and 1 BHK Apartments
features.description: Perfect for bachelors, young couples, or students starting their careers in Gurgaon. These units maximize space efficiency and are generally more budget-friendly. Located close to commercial hubs and the main road, they offer exceptional connectivity and independence. Find a comfortable and compact space ready for immediate occupation.

features.title: 2 BHK Builder Floor Rentals
features.description: A popular choice for small families or roommates, 2 BHK builder floors offer more privacy than high-rise apartments and usually come with dedicated parking space. Residents enjoy independent entry and exit points, providing a quieter, low-density living experience while still benefiting from Sector 48's excellent location and amenities.

features.title: 3 BHK High-Rise Apartments
features.description: Offering modern amenities like swimming pools, gyms, and 24/7 security, 3 BHK apartments in Sector 48 are excellent for growing families. These properties are often part of large, reputable societies, ensuring a community atmosphere and access to internal recreational facilities. High-floor units also provide stunning views of the surrounding cityscape.

features.title: 4 BHK Independent Houses
features.description: For those who need maximum space, privacy, and flexibility, independent houses are the premium choice. These homes typically feature private lawns, larger kitchens, and multiple parking slots. Rent house in Sector 48 if you require ample room for a large joint family or the freedom to customize your living environment extensively.

features.title: Duplex and Penthouse Options
features.description: Experience elevated living with spacious duplexes and penthouse units that provide luxury features such as private terraces and double-height living rooms. These highly sought-after rentals deliver an exclusive residential experience with superior finishings and panoramic views, representing the height of luxury renting in Gurgaon.

locationsSection.title: Sector 48 Gurgaon Exceptional Location and Accessibility Advantages
description: Sector 48 stands out due to its strategic position in New Gurgaon, offering residents unparalleled access to critical infrastructure and lifestyle amenities. Its immediate proximity to the HUDA City Centre Metro Station and major arterial roads like NH-48 and Sohna Road ensures quick commutes to Delhi and other parts of the NCR. This connectivity is a huge advantage for anyone looking to rent house in Sector 48.

The locality is entirely self-sufficient, surrounded by reputed institutions such as DPS International, Amity International School, and world-class healthcare facilities like Medanta The Medicity and Artemis Hospital. For daily needs and entertainment, residents have easy access to shopping malls like Omaxe Celebration Mall and Ninex City Mart. The thriving commercial ecosystem nearby, including Sector 47 and Sector 49, makes it an ideal residential choice for working professionals seeking minimal travel time.

faqSection.title: Common Questions About How to Rent House in Sector 48 Gurgaon
faqSection.description: Find quick answers to the most frequent queries regarding leasing terms, property types, and local specifics in Sector 48.

faqs.question: What is the typical rental price range for a 2 BHK apartment in Sector 48 Gurgaon
faqs.answer: The rental price for a standard 2 BHK apartment in Sector 48 typically ranges from INR 18,000 to INR 30,000 per month, depending heavily on the building type and amenities. Builder floors tend to be on the lower end, while flats within gated societies offering premium facilities like gyms, power backup, and security will fall towards the higher end of this bracket. Independent houses or larger furnished units will command significantly higher rents.

faqs.question: Are independent houses or builder floors easily available for rent in Sector 48
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 48 is known for having a good mix of residential options, and independent houses and builder floors are quite accessible here, especially compared to sectors dominated purely by high-rise complexes. Builder floors in particular are very popular due to their privacy and often generous space. Availability usually fluctuates with the season, so using an agent with active listings is advisable to secure the best properties quickly.

faqs.question: What lease duration is standard when I rent house in Sector 48
faqs.answer: The standard lease duration in Sector 48 and most of Gurgaon is 11 months, which is legally recognized as a short-term lease and simplifies renewal processes. However, landlords are increasingly open to signing 12-month or even multi-year leases for dependable tenants. Be prepared for a lock-in period, typically 6 months, where neither party can prematurely terminate the agreement without penalty.

faqs.question: What are the common security deposit requirements in this area
faqs.answer: Most landlords in Sector 48 require a security deposit equivalent to two months' rent. For highly furnished or premium luxury properties, this deposit may extend to three months' rent. This deposit is refundable at the end of the tenancy, subject to the property being returned in good condition, allowing for standard wear and tear.

faqs.question: Is Sector 48 well-connected by public transport for daily commuting needs
faqs.answer: Absolutely Sector 48 boasts excellent connectivity. While it is slightly away from the immediate metro line, rapid feeder buses, autos, and shared taxis are readily available. The proximity to Sohna Road and the Golf Course Extension Road ensures quick access to key business hubs like Cyber City and Golf Course Road via established road networks, making daily commutes efficient.

faqs.question: Are pets generally allowed in rental properties in Sector 48
faqs.answer: Pet policies vary significantly between individual landlords and residential societies. Generally, independent houses and builder floors are more accommodating towards pets than high-rise societies, where restrictions or specific rules often apply. It is crucial to confirm the pet policy explicitly before finalizing any agreement to rent house in Sector 48 to avoid future disputes.

faqs.question: What additional maintenance charges should I budget for in high-rise societies
faqs.answer: In gated high-rise societies, tenants are typically responsible for paying monthly maintenance charges which cover services like common area upkeep, security, power backup for common areas, and amenity usage. These charges can range from INR 3,000 to INR 6,000 per month, depending on the society and the size of your unit. Always clarify if these charges are included in the stated rent or are to be paid separately.

faqs.question: How quickly can I move into a rental property after finalizing the agreement
faqs.answer: Once the lease agreement is signed and the security deposit and first month's rent are paid, move-in can often happen within 2 to 7 days. This period allows for final cleaning, utility meter readings, and mandatory documentation like police verification and society registration, which must be completed before you take possession.

faqs.question: Are furnished houses common or should I expect unfurnished rentals
faqs.answer: Both furnished and unfurnished rentals are available in Sector 48. Unfurnished properties are more common in builder floors and older independent houses. Fully furnished apartments are highly available in the serviced apartment complexes and newer high-rise buildings, catering specifically to tenants looking for immediate, ready-to-move-in solutions.

faqs.question: What documents are required from a tenant to secure a rental house in Sector 48
faqs.answer: To secure a rental house, you will typically need copies of your Aadhar Card or Passport for ID proof, PAN Card, and proof of current employment or income documentation. Two passport-sized photographs are also usually required, along with any necessary references from previous landlords or employers to complete the verification process.
